assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Stalprofil S.A. distributes steel products in Poland and internationally. The company offers hot rolled profiles, channels, equal-leg angles, unequal angles, and T-bars; cold formed profiles, such as square and rectangular profiles, and channels; flat, round, square, drawn, and ribbed bars, as well as wire rods; and hot and cold rolled plates, and patterned sheets. It also provides normal, economical parallel, and wide flange I-beams, as well as W-shape flanges and special economical I-beams; ordinary, economical, and UPE channels; flat, hot rolled roundsteel, and squared bars; and isosceles T-Bars. In addition, the company produces and sells outer anti-corrosive insulation for steel pipes and tubes that are primarily used for the construction of transmission pipelines; and supplies pipes and tubes for gas engineering sector, as well as for fuel industry, heat engineering, water pipelines, sewage systems, and various other areas. Further, it provides steel structures assembly and painting services. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Dabrowa Górnicza, Poland.
